name: FIFA World Cup 2022
content:
Description: Data about each match of FIFA Men's World Cup 2022 including goals, possession, attempts, and other data.

Source: [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/die9origephit/fifa-world-cup-2022-complete-dataset?resource=download)

Columns:

 * team1 (string): What edition of the World Cup that row of data refers to. Value = 1 refers to the first ever Men's World Cup.
 * team2 (string): What year that World Cup was held in
* possession% team1 (numerical): What country hosted the World Cup games that year
* possession% team2 (numerical): The final score tally for each team in the championship game
 * possession% in contest (numerical): The name and city of the stadium the championship game was held in
* number of goals team1 (numerical): what country's team lost in the final game
* number of goals team2 (numerical): what country's team took third place
* date (string): what country's team took fourth place
* hour (string): how many countries had participating teams in that edition of the World Cup
* category (string)
* total attempts team1 (numerical)
* total attempts team2 (numerical)
* assists team1 (numerical)
* assists team2 (numerical)
* yellow cards team1 (numerical)
* yellow cards team2 (numerical)
* red cards team1 (numerical)
* red cards team2 (numerical)
* fouls against team1 (numerical)
* fouls against team2 (numerical)
* offsides team1 (numerical)
* fouls against team2 (numerical)
* passes team1 (numerical)
* passes team2 (numerical)
* passes complete team1 (numerical)
* passes complete team2 (numerical)
* corners team1 (numerical)
* corners team2 (numerical)
* free kicks team1 (numerical)
* free kicks team2 (numerical)
* penalties scored team1 (numerical)
* penalties scored team2 (numerical)
